A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''February 4, 2010''', at 20:27 UTC<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-02-04_#minecraft.log|"(15:29:03) <Notch> indev's been updated"}}</ref>. It was announced on [[The Word of Notch|TWoN]] at 20:34 UTC.<ref>[[wordofnotch:371006104|Indev update: Fully functioning bows and mobs]] – The Word of Notch, February 4, 2010 20:34 UTC</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
[[File:Bow JE2 BE1.png|width=32x32]]''' [[Bow]]s'''
* Are now fully functional.{{Info needed}}

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Creeper JE3 BE1.png|24px]] [[Creeper]]s'''
* Are hostile again.
* Only spawn in dark areas.
* Now can attack by approaching and exploding near players.
* Pathfinding tweaked so that they don't look like they break their necks every time the player moves one block.

'''[[File:Pig JE1.png|32px]] [[Pig]]s'''
* Now only spawn in bright areas.

'''[[File:White Sheep JE1.png|32px]] [[Sheep]]'''
* Now only spawn in bright areas.

'''[[File:Skeleton JE1.png|32px]] [[Skeleton]]s'''
* Are hostile again.
* Only spawn in dark areas.
* The [[purple arrows]] that skeletons throw have been removed and have been replaced by regular [[arrows]].
* Pathfinding tweaked so that they don't look like they break their necks every time the player moves one block.

'''[[File:Spider JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Spider]]s'''
* Are hostile again.
* Only spawn in dark areas.
* Pathfinding tweaked so that they don't look like they break their necks every time the player moves one block.

'''[[File:Zombie JE1.png|32px]] [[Zombie]]s'''
* Are hostile again.
* Only spawn in dark areas.
* Pathfinding tweaked so that they don't look like they break their necks every time the player moves one block.
